languages.text: "Знаю я пару мест, где можно найти новых астропатов". {n}Идира недобро ухмыляется.{/n} "Конечно, если вы не брезгуете кем-то кроме этих, с глазенками пожженными".

traits.locale_text: "Знаю я пару мест, где можно было бы по-дешевке достать новых астропатов". {n}Идира недобро ухмыляется.{/n} "Если вы, конечно, не брезгуете кем-то, кроме этих, с зенками пожжеными."

languages.text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."
languages.original_text: "Знаю я пару мест, где можно найти новых астропатов". {n}Идира недобро ухмыляется.{/n} "Конечно, если вы не брезгуете кем-то кроме этих, с глазенками пожженными".

traits.locale_text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new astropaths on the cheap." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

"I know a couple of places where you can get new astropaths on the cheap." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

"I know a couple of places where you can get new astropaths on the cheap." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

"I know a couple of places where you can get new astropaths on the cheap." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."
"I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."
"I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

languages.text: «Conozco un par de lugares donde encontrar nuevos Astrópatas». {n}Idira sonríe con malicia.{/n} «Si no le importa que no sean elegantes y educados como esta panda de ojos chamuscados».
languages.original_text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

traits.locale_text: «Conozco un par de lugares donde encontrar nuevos Astrópatas a bajo precio». {n}Idira sonríe con malicia.{/n} «Si no le importa que no sean elegantes y educados como esta panda de ojos chamuscados».

languages.text: 「新しい感応通信官を調達できる場所を数カ所知っているわ」{n}イディラは意地悪く笑う。{/n}「もちろん、ここにいる揚げ目玉集団みたく、お行儀よく上品な態度にこだわらなければの話だけどね」
languages.original_text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

traits.locale_text: 「新しい感応通信官を、安く調達できる場所を数カ所知っているわ」{n}イディラは意地悪く笑う。{/n} 「もちろん、ここにいる揚げ目玉集団みたく、お行儀よく上品な態度にこだわらなければの話だけどね」

languages.text: “我倒是知道有几个地方可以搞到新的星语者。”{n}伊迪拉充满恶意地咧嘴一笑。{/n}“当然，不能指望那些人像这群天天掉书袋的老学究一样优雅得体。”
languages.original_text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

traits.locale_text: “我倒是知道有几个地方可以弄到便宜的星语者。”{n}伊迪拉充满恶意地咧嘴一笑。{/n}“当然，不能指望那些人像这群天天掉书袋的老学究一样优雅得体。”

languages.text: "Ich kenne einige Orte, an denen man neue Astropathen bekommt." {n}Idira grinst bösartig.{/n} "Natürlich nur, wenn man nicht darauf besteht, dass sie so viel Klasse haben und so herausgeputzt sind wie dieser augenlose Haufen."
languages.original_text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kenne einige Orte, an denen man billig an Astropathen kommt." {n}Idira grinst bösartig.{/n} "Natürlich nur, wenn man nicht darauf besteht, dass sie so viel Klasse haben und so herausgeputzt sind wie dieser augenlose Haufen."

languages.text: « Je connais un ou deux endroits où vous pouvez dégoter de nouveaux astropathes, {n}lance Idira avec un sourire malicieux.{/n} À moins bien sûr que vous teniez à tout prix qu'ils soient aussi propres sur eux que ces charlots aux yeux de merlan frit. »
languages.original_text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."

traits.locale_text: « Je connais un ou deux endroits où vous pouvez dégoter de nouveaux astropathes à peu de frais, {n}lance Idira avec un sourire malicieux.{/n} À moins bien sûr que vous teniez à tout prix qu'ils soient aussi propres sur eux que ces charlots aux yeux de merlan frit. »

languages.text: "Yeni Astropat edinebileceğin birkaç yer biliyorum." {n}İdira, kasıtlı bir şekilde sırıtıyor.{/n} "Tabii ki hepsinin şu kavrulmuş gözlüler gibi şık ve düzgün olmasında ısrarcı olmazsan..."
languages.original_text: "I know a couple of places where you can get new Astropaths." {n}Idira grins maliciously.{/n} "That's of course if you don't insist on them being all classy and proper like this fried-eyed bunch."
